website_summaries.verdict: If safe outdoor heating is the goal, this is one to consider. 40,000-BTU output is bolstered by heat-retaining glass beads. Requires protection from the elements between uses, but more consistent than firewood.
pros: 40,000-BTU output from propane tank can heat 15' radius
Fire- and moisture-resistant glass beads retain heat during use
cons: Additional glass beads may be needed to fill chamber
Paint has quality control issues, especially when heated
Must be protected from rain and elements

website_summaries.verdict: This rustic-looking fire pit heats up the night and can be used as a tabletop by day.
pros: Integrated Piezo battery-operated pulse ignition system
Stainless steel cover transforms fire pit into a table
Metal top stays cool to the touch
Tall enough that small children can't reach the heat
cons: Exposure to the elements can mar the surface
Consider covering when not in use

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this fire pit and I loved it for the first month. It's beautiful and has a nice edge that you can set drinks on or kick your feet up on. The first month while using it it would randomly just turn off even though the propane tank was full. But about a month later it is now to the point where we can't even get it to stay lit for more than 5 minutes at a time. It's not hard to get it going again but it's incredibly annoying when you're trying to relax by it. If it worked properly I'd give it 5 stars but unfortunately I can't do that at this time.
customer_reviews.author: AshD

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy with product after some modifications and additional purchases
customer_reviews.text: After reading some reviews on the paint peeling on the top powder coated service after 6 months to a year (on unprotected surfaces). My husband bought a decent cover for the unit and covered the top pieces with 4 pieces of floor tile applied with construction adhesive from our local Home Depot. Bought an additional 1/4" pack of glass rocks. (colored blue and white). Installed a 1/4" steel mesh (as seen in other comments) to keep the 1/4" rocks out of the gap in the burner tray. (he cut ours to 16 1/4 x 16 1/4). Put it all together and it came out really well. We are very satisfied with the product now.
customer_reviews.author: hilda

customer_reviews.title: Great heat!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this patio heater for a party in December knowing that it was going to be very cold out for the few friends that smoke. It gave off great heat if you stand next to it. I do recommend this product for cold days. You need to cover the unit. I did buy a custom cover from a Awning co. I wanted to use a higher end fabric to protect the heater. They custom make any size cover and ship. Rockwell Awning.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony O. NY

customer_reviews.title: Great color and table! Perfect for young children
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a pretty good price for my husband for Father's Day. Added some blue rocks from Amazon to make it even more luxurious. He loved it, even though he acted like he didn't want it, but once it was setup he was in love. I have two small children and this is awesome because it is high enough to keep small arms away and I feel safe having it on to roast marshmallows. Took about an hour to put together. I've had no problem with the finish staying perfect because I did order a cover for it from Amazon. So far it's beautiful and really makes my backyard complete.
customer_reviews.author: Binnyrabbit

customer_reviews.title: Not at all suited for cold climate - Before and after photos
customer_reviews.text: We were so happy with this unit when we first got it that I went out and spent $35 on a nice duck cover to pretend take it from Vermont's winters. That was 2017. In 2018 the finish started to peel off of the metal, and I called the manufacturer to see what they could do as I felt I had done nothing wrong. They told me I could order a new door but did not want to cover it with warranty. Then another piece started peeling...and then another... I can no longer stand seeing this piece of ugliness on my deck so tomorrow it is going to the dump in the metals bin. $319.00 not well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Macatguy

customer_reviews.title: Although he said it would have definitely been better with two people
customer_reviews.text: Read ALL the reviews before I purchased this, it was hit or miss. Price was unbelievable, but the reviews were kinda scary. I took my chances....and WON. Bought this as a Birthday present. My 15 year old son...who is very mechanical put it together by himself. Although he said it would have definitely been better with two people. Like some of the other reviews he did say some of the holes did not line up. Took about four hours to assemble. It ignited right away. I did buy the extra rocks, as others had recommended, it is definitely needed and worth it. This fire pit/table was a great buy for us, it is quite big too.
customer_reviews.author: Amelita S Riccio

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for price!
customer_reviews.text: This fire pit (GS-F-PC propane) is an incredible value! The pit is sturdy and heavy. I did not expect such a great product for the price. We have used it only 3 times because of the inclement winter weather, but it is lovely. The stones that came with it are beautiful, although I plan to augment them with more. It is fascinating to watch the flame reflected in them. It also generates a fair amount of heat. I can't wait until the weather improves and we get to use it more. This pit is very heavy, so place it in the correct position, as you may not want to move it! We are extremely pleased with this fire pit!
customer_reviews.author: Eucharia Pieraccini

customer_reviews.title: Product works great, looks fantastic
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly, but since the product was made in China and the customer reviews stated that it was difficult, not impossible, to assemble because the translation in the manual was so-so, I availed myself of the professional assembly service offered by Amazon. The price was well worth it and reasonable and the person who assembled it was professional and pleasant to deal with. Product works great, looks fantastic, and well worth the purchase price. I strongly suggest purchasing the "Duck Cover Elite 50-inch Square Fire Pit Cover" if you plan to keep it outside all year long.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandro J. Veralli

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, great price
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, great price. We did order some extra glass stones for the top based on the reviews and that was helpful. It is super heavy but it can be put together by one person. It is higher than most outdoor furniture so you can't really use it as a middle coffee table, but we have ours off to the side of our outdoor seating and it adds a nice touch, keeps you warm, and has a lot of surface area if you want to put down your glass or plate. Be careful with the settings, if you have it on high it will use the propane very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I received the product very quickly. It was easy to put together. It had one piece that was bent but it was easily fixed with a mallet. I believe the shipping could be better as the box was falling apart. Maybe two separate boxes could fix that issue. The glass pieces are a bit big. I went ahead and bought smaller glass pieces which I prefer to the larger clear that came with it. Other than that it looks great on my deck and cannot wait to use it .
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Hall

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: As some other reviewers have said, some parts might come bent. Mine had one like that. And it wasn't from shipping. I contacted Amazon and I was offered a discount for keeping it the way it is. I accepted because the bent part was not visible when assembled Also, just like others have mentioned, the glass pieces are not enough to cover the burner, do yourself a favor and order another 10lbs. Actually it's relatively ok but a bit more glass is perfect. Other than that, no complaints. A perfect one would have had a recessed handle on the center cover to make the top perfectly flat (for a large pizza box, let's say) but this is minor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Looks and performs well, more fire than heat.
customer_reviews.text: Nice fire pit, has been used a ton thus far this summer. Supper easy to turn on and off. I really like the finish on this. It does take some time to build it but if you order this on prime and it gets delivered right to your door, thats the trade off. I recommend buying some glass rocks separately, as the ones that come with the fire pit will be a little beat up to due transport. Don't just dump it into the grill, as there will be glass shards and dust at the bottom of the bag. Lastly, this does not give off a ton of heat but it sure does have a quality build.
customer_reviews.author: BRADLEY KRUSE

customer_reviews.title: the pit is amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: during the shipping one of the end of the covers did get bent a little bit thus preventing it to closes fully on the top. Also to light it up you have to play around with the knob as the gas flow does not start from the beginning, you just to keep twisting the knob to get the desired flame. besides that, the pit is amazing!!! looks great in my patio
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D.

customer_reviews.title: almost 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't the easiest thing to put together and unfortunately once it was all together, the lid would not fit and in order to adjust it we would've had to take practically the whole thing a part so we opted to just leave it as is (this is the reason for the 4 stars instead of 5. Other than the lid, it works perfectly and we love it! We also purchased the cover for it as there were some reviews about it discoloring from the weather. The cover helps also hides the fact that the lid doesn't exactly fit.
customer_reviews.author: Tamlyn

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but...
customer_reviews.text: The fire pit works relatively well, and looked great for the first few days, yes, days. If the fire pit happens to get wet, and you don't get it dried off quickly, it tarnishes the paint permanently. We have tried everything to remove the stains, and ended up rubbing some of the paint off the lid. What a waste of $$$. If your fire pit will be exposed to the elements, you might want to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: A.I.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but large!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fire pit! Assembly was simple and instructions were easy to understand. The fire glass is a lovely accent, but I do recommend picking them up out of the box with gloves on and placing them in the pit rather than dumping as there is powdered glass in the bottom and it will go everywhere including in your face. It is rather large and ended up being too big for our space so we went another way, but if you have a large space this will be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: NK12

customer_reviews.title: So far pretty nice.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was straight forward. It looks very nice and is sturdy. Some of the parts were bent a bit I assume from shipping, and I couldn't get the top as flush as I would have liked to but still a very nice product. I bought the blue glass separate, bronze glass would look great as well. I also applied a good coat of auto wax to it, due to reading the complaints of oxidation. We will see how it holds up. For the price I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason T. Stensrud

customer_reviews.title: No smokey smelling clothes anymore!
customer_reviews.text: 1st time owning a propane fire pit, always had wood burners. Assembly was easy, for me at least. Very sturdy. Added some blue glass to the white that came with it. The only negative is that the automatic starter gave out fast, like a day or two of using it, but every grill I've ever owned did the same so I have plenty of long lighters ;) Our family have never enjoyed our patio so much !
customer_reviews.author: Elena Fleetwood

customer_reviews.title: Find a Better Fire Pit
customer_reviews.text: We had high hopes as this unit looked nice on our deck. Seemed to be a simple product to use as well. Our problem is that the we cannot get the flame from below to work appropriately with the ring above. The flame is causing fire to come up the side in addition to the ring. Not real safe. Tried to correct, but does not seem to be right. We had emailed the company with our concerns and did not get a response back. I would recommend that you find a better quality fire pit that you can depend on the quality and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Jody D.

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: No exaggeration here. The box says mechanical lift and it's heavy. YOU put the entire thing together. My son did it in three hours ( I am sure there was profanity involved) . He is no slouch at this assembly stuff, and said he is no Tim the Tool Man Taylor, so don't misplace the instructions. After hard work you have a fire pit worth twice what you paid, and it is simply stunning to look at! We may get another bag of glass stones, but that is personal preference. Delivery was guick also. We are very happy!
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Submitted our order on Sunday, was delivered to our doorstep on Wednesday (1 day earlier than expected)! The box is very heavy, we had all of our pieces, no scratches, no dents. Took us about an hour and a half to build, with dinner intermission included. The glass pieces are sharp, wear gloves when handling! It looks very nice & expensive! It sure does beat anything that Lowes, Home Depot or Menards has on their shelves for nearly double the price! We actually bought it while sitting on the displays in Home Depot :) We are very happy. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Geraldo Garza

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pit!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I am very impressed with this fire table! Shipping was fast and the delivery was scheduled, I received a text and a call. No scratches or dents, seems like a good solid construction and went together relatively easy. Ignited with first try no problems with the switch or the flame staying on as others had said in previous reviews. Honestly for the money this is absolutely the best value I have found, took a chance and so glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: tracey johnson

customer_reviews.title: Well built, value priced fire pit
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy it for the heat, it's a welcome byproduct though. Main purpose was to centralize family gatherings in the back yard. Added cobalt blue glass instead of using the shipped clear fire glass. Very sturdy and great value for the money paid. Nice hammered "copper" finish
customer_reviews.author: UD27

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Only received 3 legs! Also, no hardware and no instructions! Where is the quality control???? Update: OK so they are sending me a new Patio Heater, we'll see if the quality is any better. I am told that I need to box up the defective heater and return it otherwise they will charge me for the replacement heater. The box weighs over 100LBs so i am hoping UPS will come to my house to pick it up. No discount, no gift certificate, nada. Bottom line is i have been greatly inconvenienced and have been offered no compensation. Buyer beware....
customer_reviews.author: E. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: We would highly recommend this to family or friends
customer_reviews.text: We are so impressed with the exceptional quality and ease it went together. We would highly recommend this to family or friends. Nice to have a meal around using as a table then remove the center cover and light the fire to take off the evening chill. So nice to light it and turn it off when you’re done. And you don’t smell like a campfire when you go inside
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 Year Review
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for over 2 years now and even though it had little use in those two years, it's now being used daily (thanks to quarantine) and works perfectly. I've had mine sitting outside, uncovered next to my pool and it only now is showing signs of rust on the edge of the lid, about a quarter in size. I gave it a quick sand, resprayed with hammer finish paint and clear. Looks good as new. It is heavy and the front door doesn't close properly (I bent the lip the magnet catches), however that is no fault of the manufacturer. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: I felt pretty stupid after I made the switch
customer_reviews.text: I just finished putting this thing together. It took me about 2.5 hours. After about 2 hours of plugging away I realized the problem: I was using the tiny, mostly worthless "wrench" included in the packaging. I grabbed an adjustable wrench and made short work of the rest of the assembly. Make no mistake, this was my fault. I felt pretty stupid after I made the switch. So pro tip: Start out with a decent tool and be done with it. BUT, the table is awesome. Feels sturdy, the included fire rocks look super cool, and it's easy to operate. Can't wait till the sun goes down tonight so we can really enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Poynter

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Once the heater was assembled it looked nice. However, some pieces were bent, so assembly was difficult. Also there are not enough rocks included to cover the fire. And no cover like advertised. Next the price reduced by $50 from when it was ordered until delivered. Why?? And now I need to order rock and cover...
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Good height and decent Btu rating.
customer_reviews.text: Overall happy. It does throw out some heat though not a ton. Easy to assemble and looks good. Only issue is that the valve failed from day 1. Workaround is to 'tape' it open (hard to explain), which works. I do need to ask them for a replacement valve. As that is likely unusual, I would recommend this. Update - 3 years in, it had held up well. Good-quality finishes and materials.
customer_reviews.author: Hank G.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Functional
customer_reviews.text: Make sure the inner fire chamber is free of obstructions (e.g., fire glass or fire stones), and the lighting problems I have seen here should not be an issue. The only lighting issue I have ever had is when I did have such an obstruction; after clearing, it started right up.
customer_reviews.author: Michael White

customer_reviews.title: Dont hesitate - Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: We have bought a lot of things off of Amazon over the years but this is one of our favorites! Easy to set up, fun to use and great craftsmanship. . This fire pit is a great addition to our deck. The delivery and sign off seemed a bit excessive but i get they want to make sure, it is delivered as promised.
customer_reviews.author: BerlyGirl10

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for sturdy Firepit
customer_reviews.text: Another great buy for a good quality piece of mdse. This fire pit is used as an accent to our pool in Florida, but it's been cold enough to provide warmth in our 45-55 degree evenings. Easy assembly, and for the price a great buy. Flame is adjustable and provides stunning visuals , see picture
customer_reviews.author: george j

customer_reviews.title: Works great but.....
customer_reviews.text: The good: Looks nice and works great, bigger than I thought which is good. The bad: The glass white rocks look nothing like the photo, it hardly covers the burner, I just ordered another bag. The box was destroyed, I had to hammer 2 metal door guides back into place.
customer_reviews.author: tseal

customer_reviews.title: I love this fire pit
customer_reviews.text: I love this fire pit. We shopped locally, and could not find anything to compare to the price and quality. My husband and I built it together in one evening, and did not find it hard at all. Some of the previous reviews mentioned the box arriving in poor shape, we did not find this to be our case. We are so pleased. Considering the price, and free shipping, this is a great value. Similar ones at Sears and Orchards were over $600. and we prefer the glass over the lava rocks, so this fit the bill perfectly. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne zigmond

customer_reviews.title: So far so great! I am super paranoid based on reviews of ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so great! I am super paranoid based on reviews of the metal changing color but I have had not issues in the last few weeks. It has been almost 100 and our heater sits in the sun. The polish I used on it seems to work great. I have reapplied and will continue to apply to keep the surface protected. Kind of a pain but I like to keep my stuff nice. In the morning there is usually dew on the surface but it has not discolored the metal as others have said.
customer_reviews.author: Hollidazzle

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't hard to assemble, just time consuming and we even bought extra rocks like a lot things say to do to get more heat. But I sit right next to it and its not even warm. Nor is it very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Corey McCready

customer_reviews.title: Easier to assemble than reported.
customer_reviews.text: Rather proud of myself. The reviews on this diy said you might be able to assemble it in 3-4 hours if you have a math degree...all the way to ‘even an engineer couldn’t assemble this in 1 day alone. The directions are terrible and the pictures are worthless. Well, 2 hours after opening the box I’m sitting here with my dinner and beverage. Every picture was dead on accurate and the sparse verbal directions were almost unnecessary.
customer_reviews.author: Geezerteacher

customer_reviews.title: Purchased a defective and dangerous unit
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this last year and were just now able to use it for the first time ... the burner unit was preassembled - defective. Flames shot out from under the cabinet and immediately charred the glass - happy the propane tank did not blow up.
customer_reviews.author: Dorrie

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a larger fire pit and fits the gas tank underneath nicely. Wasn't aweful to put together although as some other reviewers mentioned a socket set is a MUST. I haven't had any problems with the finish or the paint, yet....however the ignition switch is definitely a bit finicky. It only works 1/5 times and you have to turn it to "high" as soon as u get a flame. Overall a huge bang for your buck and it is perfect for a small yard / porch especially if you don't want to have to deal with chopping wood! I'm sure it'll only be good for a few seasons but for a couple hundred bucks you can't beat it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Tassone

customer_reviews.title: Best bargain out there
customer_reviews.text: Best bargain out there, one part damaged during delivery, manufacturer sent new part right away. Flame is adjustable from about 2" to 12". Great addition to our deck. Plenty of room to set drinks or small plates. FOLLOW ALL DIRECTIONS, wax the heck out of it before use so it doesn't discolor and get a good cover.
customer_reviews.author: MOMpls

customer_reviews.title: Great table for price
customer_reviews.text: Needs a bigger burner ring . Preferably square. 8" ring doesn't utilize the 18x18 area. The bigger flame from bigger burner would make it a better product. Love the hammered bronze finish. All round great deal for the price. I reccomend a 6" glass wind guard. Got one for mine and the center lid fits perfectly on top.
customer_reviews.author: mearl billings

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Delighted!
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived in great condition, with only two small holes in the outer box. Most parts are in their own boxes inside the outer box so nothing was damaged. Amazon shipped this 151-pound package by motor freight (Pilot) rather than UPS or FedEx, so maybe that's why it wasn't beat up as many other reviews have indicated. No damaged parts, no missing parts, exactly the right number of fasteners and easy-to-follow instructions. My husband and I had this assembled in 90 minutes and it looks gorgeous! We ordered an additional 10-pounds of colored fire glass and put it on top of the supplied clear glass. Started up on the first try and working great!
customer_reviews.author: B. Steinfeldt

customer_reviews.title: A nice addition to the patio
customer_reviews.text: This makes a nice addition to our patio. Took a couple hours to assemble, but the instructions are very good and they even supply a screwdriver and wrench. Based on other reviews, I got someto put in around the burner and then added the glass that comes with it on top of that to fill the pit.
customer_reviews.author: George S

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It sure would be nice if they included the instructions!!!!! Epic fail save yourself the frustration and get one at Lowe’s or Home Depot already assembled! Unless you have tiny baby hands it’s very very difficult to assemble! I feel robbed I’m returning it
customer_reviews.author: irishkelly72

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Great looking heater. We had a little hard time putting it together, but with some common sense we have completed the assembly. Emits enough heat, nice and big. plenty of room for small plate and a glass. great appeal. I use my boat cleaners/polishers to keep it clean. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Boris

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Box arrived in fine shape. We did have one bent metal part that turned out to be ok once everything was together. Took us just a few hours. A two person job for sure. Jury is still out on how the finish will last as it is still brand new but worked great immediately so 5 stars for now. I'll add that it comes with large chunks of white fire glass. I looked at other reviews and couldn't find what kind of glass it came with so making it easier for the next person. Only major downside were the tiny tools they gave for assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L. Palisin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and perfect for a deck. It puts off a lot of heat and can also be used as a table during parties. We did buy a cover for it so it doesn't rust. Wonderful product at an amazing price. I am very happy that we went with this one. If you're thinking about getting this, do it. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition
customer_reviews.text: So far we are happy with our purchase. It looks nice and matches our patio set. I did wax it as instructed to protect the finish and added chicken wire to elevate the rocks. The only issue is that it doesn’t ignite on the first click, maybe on the third try. For the price this is nice addition to our screen porch
customer_reviews.author: kevin wirgau

customer_reviews.title: nice value and satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Good value. sturdy. delivers on promise. GREAT for the price. nice fire bowl could be alittle shorter. nice ledge to use as a table comes with a cover. You do have to assemble. took us a couple of hoiurs but it worked first time. added blue fire rocks for accent but not necessary just looks great. One tiny annoyance they did not send a screw to attach the lid knob and I have had a hell of a time finding the right screw. I would buy this again
customer_reviews.author: kathyg

customer_reviews.title: Instructions were fairly easy to understand
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived safely, with NO DAMAGE. I put it together by myself which took about 2.5 hours. Instructions were fairly easy to understand. My only issue was one hole was not threaded so I had to dig up a bolt and nut to make the connection work. No problem. I did wax it when I was all done and it has been about 20 years since I buffed wax off a car. I was verrrrry sore the next day. You can even see a little wax in the picture. I LOVE the green glass I ordered. I'm a happy camper with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GNR

customer_reviews.title: Very well built!! I have an issue with ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well built!! I have an problem with 2 of the legs that were damaged during shipping. This was a gift for my Mother In-laws Birthday and now I am dealing with AZ Patio Heaters to get two new legs. The person I talked to was very helpful on the phone and directed me to the Warranty department. Now I am waiting on them to get back ahold of me. I will post the results.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Dischinger

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase from amazon ever!
customer_reviews.text: Item was damaged, see pictures. Once we opened the box, lots of stuff damaged, there was parts of a leg missing and one whole leg was unaccounted for. It was also missing the entire burning unit. Totally disappointed in this seller and the entire purchase. Was looking forward to enjoying the table this weekend with the cooler weather, guess not!
customer_reviews.author: Tijana

customer_reviews.title: ... gleefully brought this to my local transfer station and enjoyed throwing piece by piece into the metal pile
customer_reviews.text: I gleefully brought this to my local transfer station and enjoyed throwing piece by piece into the metal pile. It was a pain to put together. It never worked right. The flame would routinely go out (even after replacing the regulator) If it actually stayed lit for more than a few minutes my entire upper deck would reek of propane. Even the fire glass it comes with is large chunks of clear glass that will cut you if you're not careful. Please pass this one by...
customer_reviews.author: Craig LaPaglia

customer_reviews.title: Terrible finish. DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the finish. After a few years the finish is coming off the steel and looks terrible. Will have to discard after only two years of use. Would not recommend for purchase
customer_reviews.author: Vester L Wright III

customer_reviews.title: Good recommendations, as we've used this extensively during football ...
customer_reviews.text: We replaced the fire glass, as it doesn't cover enough; We used fire gems in a blue color; it complements the copper color of the surrounding table top. I also read other reviews and used glossy clear spray sealant to protect against any water damage. Good recommendations, as we've used this extensively during football season and through the holidays. Many drinks have been placed on the tables and no damage. They look beautiful and we get many requests for where we purchased them. Best price was on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. Product started great but rusted to the point where it literally fell apart in a little over 1 year. I live near the coast so some rust could be expected but this literally disintegrated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Propane heater
customer_reviews.text: I love how sturdy and the look of the glass. I took camping and used (we are no fires in Oregon in summer) and i realized it is very tall when sitting by it- most would put their feet up on the side or stand occasionally. Bought a cover for it also to keep it beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Wood

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a steal for this price!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a steal for this price! I've been shopping fire pits for over a year and one of my friends purchased this and as soon as I saw his I purchased mine. Takes 30-60 minutes to assemble, but isn't hard and the directions are easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Webb

customer_reviews.title: ... it doesn't get used as often as we would like but it is so nice to just sit for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is our second season of using and it doesn't get used as often as we would like but it is so nice to just sit for even a few minutes without having to start a bonfire where we feel like we should sit and enjoy for at least an hour. Another advantage is we don't smell like smoke. On the other hand, there isn't the smoke smell of the wood which is also very enjoyable!!! It works good though and was a worthwhile purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Definitely, go for it
customer_reviews.text: We are loving it! I put this together with my daughter in about an hour. No crying, we had everything we needed. It is really beautiful on our covered patio- it's taller than we thought it would be- we are even using it to eat meals. At first I thought it would be too high but it is absolutely perfect. It gives off a lot of heat, perfect for the cool rocky mountain evenings. It is about 7 feet from my patio door and as soon as I step through I can feel the warmth. I feel it's good quality, all parts were present, box was in decent shape. Good purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Mel C

customer_reviews.title: Great for backyard portable fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Great for backyard portable fire pit, you must get cover don't leave in sun or rain. Needs more glass rocks which is annoying. All and all you will spend about $50 on cover and glass rocks of your choosing. I hate upsells just include it and charge a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: JWP

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Box is very heavy. Need two people to move. Very well packed and all pieces where in good condition with no missing parts. Takes a good 1-2 hours to assemble. Directions are easy to follow. Big unit. A bit tall for low lying chairs. Heat if fine at a very close proximity. Better for the effect not the heat. Comes with clear glass chunks. Looks nice and easy to start. Would recommend a lower unit for small areas.
customer_reviews.author: matthew josephhager

customer_reviews.title: Amazing .
customer_reviews.text: This is amAzing . Super warm and cozy to stay around the fire . My daughter loves it .
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Silva

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this beautiful fire pit
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought this fire pit for our backyard since our city fire ordinance doesn't allow open fires. We talked to the fire Marshall and got a permit to have this. This thing is heavy so be mindful when you install it. But it's as sturdy as a rock. Well built, good quality, and looks attractive. During parties people always comments on it. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GhostHog

customer_reviews.title: 6 months later and looks terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a replacement top because our first one started to peel within two months. Put this one on last November. 6 months later it looks like this. Please trust the reviews. This is not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: D.V.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: The thing was pretty easy to build, and looks great too. My only complaint is with the amount tumbled glass that comes with it. I ended up ordering 2 10 pound bags of red glass pebbles. I made a ring out of paper to go around the burner and filled that with the white glass that comes with it. Then I poured the red glass around the out side of the paper, and lifted that paper out. It is just perfect now. From what I have seen, even with the added expense, all in all it is still a good value. Lava rock might be a good option if you're on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: CeeDubb

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: took about 2 hours to fix. The bottom was tricky but we got it. It works and looks very nice in the space I wanted it to. The flames 🔥 are nice and I bought the extra blue fire glass. It comes with clear fire glass. Will post pictures soon! The overall quality is good. The finish is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Rosey

customer_reviews.title: Finicky burner control switch
customer_reviews.text: Have had a few issues with the fire staying lit. I found one loose connector and tightened that which helped for a couple of times but now its doing the same thing again where once its lit and you try to adjust the high/low setting it will just go out. Only way it stays lit is if I hold the knob pressed in. Once I let go the fire goes out so there is either something still loose or something defective on the burner control.
customer_reviews.author: Walter G. Merriam IV

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Box a little beat up when arrived which concerned me based on previous reviews, but all okay . Easy to assemble. The problem is that it does not light properly. There is a gas odor, and the flames are on, the off, then on, then off. Once it stays lit, it is smoky, unless you run it on high. All the rocks turned black from the smoke, as well as the cover on our couch. We tried to do some adjustments, moved the rocks away from the ring etc., and nothing works. Have a call into technical support.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C

customer_reviews.title: Good table - but gas knob eventually fails
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am very happy with this table for what it cost. It is sturdy & easy enough for a high schooler to assemble. The only thing that has failed after 2 years is that the gas knob has become a little glitchy. You have to mess with it a bit for it to stay lit. Other than that, this is a great table. Definitely cover it, because it will rust if you don't.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged--you must assemble, many parts
customer_reviews.text: Obviously this thing has been sent back many times. The box was falling apart, exposing the product. It has so many pieces! It looked like way too much work when there are options that come put together and do not fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: seth

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great fire pit, great price.
customer_reviews.text: The box the fire pit came in was delivered in perfect shape. I left the box on the porch and removed the parts as the box is heavy. Good instructions, very easy to put together. Leg position was labeled clearly. Started first time. Like that the flame is adjustable. I did order an extra bag of glass and the duck cover as was suggested in other reviews. Excellent quality for the money and the free shipping is an added bonus. We are very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding service
customer_reviews.text: Smart looking, nice addition to my backyard. Super customer service, best i ever delt with. Emailed them with my issue a missing part due to package damage. The time between my email and them shipping a replacement part was about 5 min. OUTSTANDING!. I don't think you could as for better service. I would not hesitate to recommend Az to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Vana

customer_reviews.title: Assembly instructions were pretty good. Top would not assemble flat without effort
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in a beat up box, and a couple of pieces were bent. Assembly instructions were pretty good. Top would not assemble flat without effort. The amount of fire glass included is not sufficient to cover the burner completely (as indicated by the advertised picture). This is deceptive, and you will need to purchase more fire glass for the desired look. I give overall quality a C-.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lid gets stuck
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fire pit, that looks the size. However the lady is very hard to pull out as it is too tight. Could be because one of the parts came a little dented but after spending hours putting it all together there’s no sense trying to return it for the lead not being able to come off easily. I assume after a couple times of yanking it pretty hard that the knob will come off.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Large table
customer_reviews.text: This table is excellent, it’s a little bigger then expected but it is actually worked out perfect. The table is sturdy and well put together.
customer_reviews.author: Gift Card

customer_reviews.title: Very well-built and it wasn't hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: I love this fire pit table! It is so pretty I get compliments on it all the time. It's very sturdy and seems to be built very well. I would recommend this product to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Ingle

customer_reviews.title: Went together pretty well. Initial lighting was a bit off but ...
customer_reviews.text: Went together pretty well. Initial lighting was a bit off but has since cleared up. Nice unit and good price compared to what I had seen on other sites.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Duhr

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Can’t even assemble this anything past the door handles. Each bolt thread in the angle iron pieces are so mangled you can’t get a bolt through it. Absolutely dissatisfied! Had I tried to assemble this prior to now I would absolutely return this.
customer_reviews.author: TerrySouthern

customer_reviews.title: If you lean over it and don't catch fire it is nice. It looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Sends heat directly straight up in the air. If you lean over it and don't catch fire it is nice. It looks nice, it is easy to assemble, it comes with enough glass to partially fill the center of the heating element. I filled the rest with lava rocks and it looks nice. Again looks good performs crap.
customer_reviews.author: Langham

customer_reviews.title: Great patio fire for the price
customer_reviews.text: Our box arrived quite damaged, likely the fault of the carrier. A few of the pieces were bent, but easily fixed with a rubber mallet. None of the exterior pieces were bent or damaged. Assembly was relatively easy, all the pieces were either labeled or easy to identify. It was estimated to take approximately 1 hr which was accurate. The glass that came with it was pretty, but a bit plain. We chose to add some smaller blue glass for more color. We did purchase a rain cover for it as well to protect the finish. Overall, we are very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff J.

customer_reviews.title: Better than anything I've seen at home improvement stores
customer_reviews.text: Great fire pit. This piece may require a couple hours of assembly time (max), but it's so worth it. This piece is super sturdy (make sure you tighten everything up). The height makes it safer should you have small childern. It also puts off good heat on high and can be adjusted down if you just want to enjoy the light without all the heat. I read reviews where there were concerns over chipped paint when removed from the box. I had zero concerns when I received my fire pit. I have recommended this fire pit to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: SmartyPants

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: We have ours for 3 months now and just love it. We cannot not find any fault with ours. Two friends have bought one and they like theirs also. In the early evening we quite often use the top as a table for happy hour then clear it for when it gets cool and light up the fire.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perceived safety hazard when trying to light the heater.
customer_reviews.text: If it had lasted more than a few months, this would have been a good product. We enjoyed it immensely while it worked. However, it started being difficult to light. Activating the igniter requires reaching at an awkward angle far under the top of the heater. The last straw was the backfire when my arm was fully extended under the heater and my face was not far behind. I felt it was no longer safe to try to light it. The instructions were totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Rat

customer_reviews.title: It's been years since purchase and it's still going strong
customer_reviews.text: We love this. Super easy to use. Durable however, the lid is warped - probably just need to take the time to adjust with pliers. Overall we have moved twice and it made it through the moves!
customer_reviews.author: Beauty mom

customer_reviews.title: Love it... it comes with rocks!!
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful fire pit.. love it!! Tons of pieces, so be ready. It comes with rocks!! The rocks are clear so I ordered more for color effects..
customer_reviews.author: DPM

customer_reviews.title: top peels
customer_reviews.text: We've had this fire pit for a few years. Love it, but after about a year, the top paint started to peel off. Looks awful and will probably buy another one but different brand. Too bad, otherwise works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, but doesn't come packaged to protect it.
customer_reviews.text: The heat output was awesome. It comes with white fire rock, but needs a bit more. The box was damaged with holes in it, and 2 panels, plus the top was dented pretty bad. It was a Christmas present, and no time to send it back, so we hammered them out best we could. They aren't too terribly noticeable now.
customer_reviews.author: TERESA NAIL

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and packaging was good!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Fast delivery! I ordered on Sunday and received this beastly box on Wednesday....and I dont even need it until spring!! The box was in good condition and I went thru everything to make certain all parts were included. I had read previous reviews of parts missing but in my case, everything was there. Im a weekend warrior guy and to me the pieces seemed to be heavy gauge steel with a quality, hammered-like copper finish. I hope it weathers well because as received, it looks fantastic for the price! I will try it out this spring with my Bud Light! Lee
customer_reviews.author: Lee R. Katzmarek

customer_reviews.title: Just like a Gremlin, don't get it wet.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this fore pit for a few years. We got extra glass, def needs it. The main problem with this table is if it gets wet, the paint peels and bubbles off the top.
customer_reviews.author: C. Madden

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful unit, zero quality -- Don't spend your money
customer_reviews.text: Junk! Bought 9/15, finally removed from our temp control garage and assembled 3 months ago. Only to use it once & find bubbled finish and lid no longer able to seamlessly fit the u it. All these issues even with storing it under the recommended cover. Save your money and buy something more durable. It's an outdoor fireplace, it should be build to withstand the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Amandaemma

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was a nightmare, instructions very non-specific...not happy with the placement of the igniter. Overall, I regret buying this model. Stay clear of it,not worth all the trouble assembling it.
customer_reviews.author: June Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great product, year round
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, easy to build. Better-looking than the pictures on Amazon. It's a bit higher than a typical table, so be aware of the height if you plan to use it as a table... The propane fire system is amazing. Perfect for backyard ambiance. Highly recommend, especially for the price. Most compatible units would cost double.
customer_reviews.author: Bassic

customer_reviews.title: Caveat emptor
customer_reviews.text: VERY UNHAPPY - Apparently I've received only a partial shipment. There are not enough parts to even begin to assemble. There are no instructions or contact information or the "fireglass" that's supposed to cover the burner. I've received pieces labeled left & right door, a twisted/bent piece of flat bar metal, only 1 side piece and the fire pan. Shipping box was taped loosely and not securely closed.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value.
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous product. Nicer in person than pictures. No trouble putting it together especially when you read through the pointers you get from other reviews. It comes with rocks but you may want to order more up front because they don't really full the pit area. Some trouble initially with the igniter.
customer_reviews.author: Liz D

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves this. Got it for Christmas present and it was a big hit! Sturdy and beautiful color. Bought the bronze patio heater and they look great together. It was pretty light outside when the picture was taken. My nephew says it has a great flame and gives off a lot of heat.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with the quality of this product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this fire pit! Arrived in excellent condition, was fairly easy to install by one individual within a couple of hours and looks fantastic. The color of this is a nice bronze, which makes it blend with with our outdoor space - not too modern. The glass beads that come with the pit are nice and smooth, which is a bonus - no jagged/sharp edges! I would highly recommend this fire pit, and in fact I already have. Some good friends of ours were so impressed with the pictures that they are going to buy one for themselves :) Will report back if anything starts to turn south from here, but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: D. Butterfield

customer_reviews.title: A few drawbacks, but overall I recommend purchasing!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful fire pit. It works just as expected and I do recommend to others. The only drawbacks.....it was somewhat damaged in shipping (my husband fixed it), it is a pain to put together, and you need to order an extra 10lb of glass. I recommend this product despite the drawbacks.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: It is worth the cost. I hate to put things together and I was able to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Garland Shreves

customer_reviews.title: Nice Unit
customer_reviews.text: very nice unit for the price. 3 settings low med and high. nice rail to sit drinks and food on. very heavy and durable bought the duck cover to go with it.40" wide, fits great
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M.

product_meta.title: AZ Patio Heaters GS-F-PC Propane Fire Pit, 40,000 BTU, Square, Antique Bronze Finish
product_meta.description: The Hiland propane Antique Bronze fire pit blends in beautifully with your other wooden or wicker patio furniture. The solid steel construction is incredibly durable & a hammered bronze finish gives it a rustic look that suits outdoor living. A integrated piezo ignition gives way to a propane heater that emits to 41, 000 BTU of heat. Clear, chunky fire glass covers the burner & adds a touch of elegance. An easy access door located at the base allows you to conceal a 20 lb. Propane tank (not included). & for your added safety, This fire pit comes with a thermocouple flame failure device.
feature_bullets: New and Improved Packaging to ensure safe and complete delivery
38 square tabletop, 28 tall. 19 inch square lid, 17 inch square burn area
Integrated Piezo ignition; Must use fireglass of at least 3/4 inch diameter
Heat output: 40,000 BTU’s. Heating area-approx. 15 square feet

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars1,029 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
